channel.title: Project Keldagrim - Where unique becomes a reality!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i1205.photobucket.com/albums/bb431/I_Vain_I/keldagrimwithflow3.png[/img][/center]
[left]Alright, this project is to mainly prove to everyone it is possible to make a stable server that is both fun and entertaining and has as little glitches and bugs as possible. The server base will be Riotscape and the server/client will under no circumstances be released so please do not comment asking if this will be. This will be hosted by myself..[/left]
[center]Developers: Alex: Server/Client/Main server Owner (Me) Shadow: Website/Co Owner[/center]
[b][size=12pt]Client:[/size][/b] The Client runs very quickly with no lag whatsoever, [left] [size=12pt][b]Interfaces:[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Full out teleport interface(75%)[/li] [li]New friends and ignore tabs(97%)[/li] [li]Options interface(10%)[/li] [li]Quest/Achievement tab(0%)[/li][/ul]
[size=12pt][b]Working on:[/b][/size]
[ul][li] Toggle from Full tabs and fixed tabs in fullscreen[/li] [li] New login box/background and buttons[/li] [li] Lobby and world switching[/li] [li] Loading bar[/li] [li] Pack sprites[/li] [li] 641 Animation[/li] [li] 641 Npcs[/li] [li] 641 Gfx[/li] [li] 641 Objects[/li] [li] 641 Maps[/li][/ul]
[size=12pt][b]Finished:[/b][/size]
[ul][li] HD fullscreen[/li] [li] Quick Prayers[/li] [li] Quick Curses[/li] [li] 641 Items[/li] [li] 602 Npcs[/li] [li] 602 gfx[/li] [li] 602 animations[/li] [li] Alert Messager[/li] [li] 50mb Cache[/li] [li] New bank interface[/li][/ul]
[size=12pt][b]Media:[/b][/size]
Quick Curses/Prayers: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rv9STEFmjvQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rv9STEFmjvQ[/url]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2gt9d8k.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/vf8etc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/2577/fullscreentw.png[/img]
[/left]
[center][b][size=12pt]Server:[/size][/b]
The server is going to be highly stable and very efficient with loads of content and lots of stuff to do.
[size=12pt][b]Working on:[/b][/size] - 50+ Bosses Not going, to go into detail about them at the moment will later
- 10+ Quests will also go into more detail about this later
- Amazing combat perfect specials
- All Known dupes fixed
- Perfect Magic Books "Including miasmic spells"
- User friendly teleporting system
- Full Achievement system
- New Clan chat with Ranks, promoting, demoting, Owners, ect..
- Full Treasure trails system nonstop will never get bored of it
- Party room
- Player owned shops/Grand Exchange 'Not sure which one is better yet'
- Full EP system
- Flawless Ancient curses
[size=12pt][b]Minigames:[/b][/size]
- Bounty Hunter: When in the wilderness you will be randomly assigned a target when killing your target you have a chance of a rarer drop according to your EP Percent
- Barrows -DONE, You should all know what barrows is lul
- Damage Wars: You choose a team the two teams fight untill the time is up the team that got the most total damage wins.
- Fight Caves, Fight Jad for the famous fire cape
- Attack Of the zombies: Endless waves of zombies come at you and your 4 other team members, you go in game with one weapon to start with and kill the zombies for Points use the points at the random box for random weapons. Also use the points to buy food. The zombies drop perks that will help you in game aka: Nuke Kills all the remaining zombies of that wave. Your team will then be entered into the online highscores to compete with other teams.
- Free for all: Compete against other players till the end and see who is the champion
-Castle wars- Not sure about this yet
- Lottery: Place money into the lottery get your chance at becoming rich!
-Pest control: Full with the npc's portals and everythign
- Mage Arena
- WarriorsGuild
[size=12pt][b]Skills:[/b][/size] All skills working flawless, will go into detail about the newer skills below.
- Dungeoneering: Work your way through floors and boss rooms gaining tokens to use at the dungeoneering shop. In the dungeoneering rooms you gain money too spend on Armour and food to protect yourself you can also make your own Armour and more.
- Summoning: Summon your own Npc that follows you around and helps you fight bosses and pk with clans and more! Some even store items like the 'Pack Yak' Or you can just have a cute little pet with you while you skill. Collect charms from killing monsters and buy shards and get certain meats and a variety of items to make the pouches to summon these great familiars.
[/center]
[left][size=12pt][b]Website:[/b][/size]
[ul][li] Smf forums but will be very professional looking and easy to use [/li]
[li] Homepage that is very user friendly and pleasing to look at but yet complex in its own way[/li]
[li] Kdr on highscores[/li]
[li] Skill highscores[/li]
[li] Monster database search up a boss thats in game and find out what it drops and its max hits[/li]
[li] Attack of zombies highscores[/li]
[li] Autodonation[/li]
[li] Vote for cash[/li]
[li] Lots more need to talk to shadow about it :p[/li][/ul]
[/left] [center][b]Updates will be posted here:[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nM4-pxChWgk ^ Wanted to show you guy's some of many features and that this project did not die! Is it stable? [IMG]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/73/keldagrimsource.png[/img]
[/center] [center]Please do not find this as bullshit if you have nothing nice to say don't post it simple as that. If you would like to be put on the beta list please comment with your Msn and I will add you to the beta list when it comes out.
Oh also the server wont be released until tested with a bot with 500+ players on the server for 5 days with no leak to make sure.
[size=12pt][b]Beta List:[/b][/size] *Loveandpower* *ExtremeX-Scape* [/center]

item.title: Project Keldagrim - Where unique becomes a reality!
item.dc:creator: @zaz278 zaz278
item.description:
@zaz278 wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:71, topic:396277”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=493446.msg3713820#msg3713820 date=1313513266]

[center]
The Client runs very quickly with no lag whatsoever,

Well, I’d hope so. If it didn’t you would be backtracking facepalm
That’s extremely pointless to include. If the client isn’t some 317 loading 500+ crap, it will be stable.
[/quote]
This is dead.[/quote]

Actually this project is not dead, It’s only gotten better. I do not do anything on mopar if you would like to follow this project it’s on google.
http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/projects/335345-keldagrim-where-unique-becomes-reality.html

Change Google.org to Rune - Server No spaces

Read full topic

Yes I am serious, and I might release it when im done ill be adding damage Soaking also the combat im going for will be 100% perfect all spells working, all weapons perfect and the combat will be well written. Im going to make a poll if I should release it when im done.[/quote]
I’d like to see it hosted and play it first before I mess everything up :P. People would play this, if you need staff for the game or a forum at all, hit me up.
